Lattices

Here are a few examples that illustrate lattices.js. The lattices are visualized with d3js.

Hover over the lattice to display node information.

Square lattice with periodic boundary conditions and 8-node neighborhood

var latt = lattices.square(5)

Hexagonal lattice with periodic boundary conditions

var latt = lattices.hex(5)

Square lattice with Dirichlet (non-periodic) boundary conditions

var latt = lattices.square(4).boundary("dirichlet")

Hexagonal lattice with Dirichlet (non-periodic) boundary conditions

var latt = lattices.hex(4).boundary("dirichlet")

Square lattice with periodic boundary conditions and 4-node neighborhood

var latt = lattices.square(6).hood("n4")

Square lattice with spatial scale 10 (default 1.0)

var latt = lattices.square(7).scale(10)

Hexagonal lattice with spatial scale 10 (default 1.0)

var latt = lattices.hex(7).scale(10)
